attributes.action: Give Midge Ure a knighthood for services of charity work (Band Aid /Band Aid 20 and Live 8 ) and his services to the music industry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Midge Ure has continued his charity work, with overseeing Band Aid 20 and Live 8. His contributionton to music services has continued to be incorporated within this.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
